verbs.description: as [ARG0: stocks] [V: dive] [ARG1: a merrill lynch market gauge with a perfect record] just flashed a red warning light the frantic dash into stocks has hit a boiling point with bank of america merrill lynch telling clients friday that it time to sell merrill lynch bank of america merrill lynch bofaml financial markets japan citigroup mutual funds dow chemical company
